charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B) and 21:846 Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute heroin (OFFENSE DATE: 8/30/91-2/92) MAX PENALTY: 40 yrs and/or $2 million and 4 yrs SRT (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 137 mo. to serve as to each count, to run concurrently w/each other and w/sentence imposed on 4/13/92 @ 184th District Court, Harris County, followed by 8 yrs SRT in Ct. 1 and 6 yrs in Cts. 2 &; 3, to run concurrently (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) Distribution of heroin (OFFENSE DATE: 9/20/91) MAX PENALTY: 20 yrs and/or $1 million and 3 yrs SRT (2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: 137 mo. to serve as to each count, to run concurrently w/each other and w/sentence imposed on 4/13/92 @ 184th District Court, Harris County, followed by 8 yrs SRT in Ct. 1 and 6 yrs in Cts. 2 &; 3, to run concurrently (2-3)
